subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: By May 19, the Knicks will know their place in the 2015 draft, but with $26 million in salary-cap space, the team president said, “A lot of our direction is about free agency.”
snippet: By May 19, the Knicks will know their place in the 2015 draft, but with $26 million in salary-cap space, the team president said, “A lot of our direction is about free agency.”
